U

User - Class in MyContacts
This class creates object User and contains all methods that deals with this object. Object User represents a group of groups of contacts belongs to one person. Object User attributes : *User name : the user name which these groups of contacts belongs to. *Pass word : user's password to keep his privacy. *Path : path of the folder that contains the user groups.
User() - Constructor for class MyContacts.User
 
User(String, String) - Constructor for class MyContacts.User
Creates a folder named after user name and creates a file txt named "Password" where the pass word of user will be written in certain code.
userMenu(User) - Static method in class MyContacts.Method
Handels the dealing with the user option menu.
userName - Variable in class MyContacts.Group
